trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot BizTalk Services using operation logs | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot BizTalk Services using operation logs | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot BizTalk Services using operation logs.

trans-unit.source: MABS, WABS

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Services: Troubleshoot using operation logs
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Services: Troubleshoot using operation logs

trans-unit.source: What are the Operation Logs
trans-unit.target: What are the Operation Logs

trans-unit.source: Operation Logs is a Management Services feature available in the Azure Management portal that allows you to view historical logs of operations performed on your Azure services, including BizTalk Services.
trans-unit.target: Operation Logs is a Management Services feature available in the Azure Management portal that allows you to view historical logs of operations performed on your Azure services, including BizTalk Services.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to view historical data related to management operations on your BizTalk Service subscription as far back as 180 days.
trans-unit.target: This enables you to view historical data related to management operations on your BizTalk Service subscription as far back as 180 days.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] This feature only captures logs for management operations on BizTalk Services, such as when the service was started, backed up, and so on.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] This feature only captures logs for management operations on BizTalk Services, such as when the service was started, backed up, and so on.

trans-unit.source: Such operations are tracked irrespective of whether they are performed from the Azure Management Portal or by using the [BizTalk Service REST APIs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn232347.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Such operations are tracked irrespective of whether they are performed from the Azure Management Portal or by using the [BizTalk Service REST APIs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn232347.aspx).

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of operations that are tracked using Management Services, see [Operations Tracked Using Azure Management Services](#bizops).
trans-unit.target: For a complete list of operations that are tracked using Management Services, see [Operations Tracked Using Azure Management Services](#bizops).

trans-unit.source: This does not capture the logs for activities related to BizTalk Service runtime (such as message processed by bridges, and so on.).
trans-unit.target: This does not capture the logs for activities related to BizTalk Service runtime (such as message processed by bridges, and so on.).

trans-unit.source: To view these logs, use the Tracking view from the BizTalk Services portal.
trans-unit.target: To view these logs, use the Tracking view from the BizTalk Services portal.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Messages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/hh949805.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Tracking Messages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/hh949805.aspx).

trans-unit.source: View BizTalk Services Operation Logs
trans-unit.target: View BizTalk Services Operation Logs

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, select **Management Services**, and then select the **Operation Logs** tab.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, select **Management Services**, and then select the **Operation Logs** tab.

trans-unit.source: You can filter the logs based on different parameters like subscription, date range, service type (e.g. BizTalk Services), service name, or status of the operation (Succeeded, Failed).
trans-unit.target: You can filter the logs based on different parameters like subscription, date range, service type (e.g. BizTalk Services), service name, or status of the operation (Succeeded, Failed).

trans-unit.source: Select the checkmark to view the filtered list.
trans-unit.target: Select the checkmark to view the filtered list.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows activities related to testbiztalkservice:
trans-unit.target: The following image shows activities related to testbiztalkservice:

trans-unit.source: View operation logs
trans-unit.target: View operation logs

trans-unit.source: To view more about a specific operation, select the row, and click **Details** in the task bar at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: To view more about a specific operation, select the row, and click **Details** in the task bar at the bottom.
